Define explicit run states and transition map; implement state machine in `agent-runner.ts`; add invalid-transition guardrails; add deterministic unit tests for all paths
Define checkpoint schema; checkpoint at tool and turn boundaries; persist checkpoints through storage repository; replay on restart from latest valid checkpoint
Add Rust retry envelope with transient error classification; add idempotency keys from command layer; dedupe duplicate retried actions
Add IPC handlers for resume/timeline commands; validate payloads with strict type schemas; return typed errors for invalid payloads
Replace provider substring matching with structured error taxonomy; map retry hints and backoff strategies; add fixture tests for error class precision
Add stream stall detector in event hook; add recover action in chat store/UI; emit stall/recover events with diagnosis reason
Persist message queue and pending permissions in durable state keyed by session/run; restore on reload
Emit run health counters in event emitter; surface live reliability stats in benchmark UI
Create shared memory types (`memory.ts`); export through shared type index; validate payload contracts
Bump DB schema and add memory tables; implement repositories for atoms/queries/feedback; add integration tests
Refactor sidecar memory-service to DB-backed adapter; keep compatibility facade for existing commands
acceptance: Legacy memory commands continue to work
